attributes.action: let the british public vote on the location of the super casino(blackpool)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to see some  opportunities for the "Great" British public to have a say on where the forthcoming "super casino " should be sighted. I believe the choice of Manchester is not representing the majority of public opinion.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
